rows.label: qev050404_MSG0001
rows.name:
Nnngh... You are strong, human. But why does a
warrior of your caliber serve as sellsword for my
damnable fool of a son?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now I am free of your tyranny, Father!
Free of your house and the Wrothian ways!
My life in New LA begins now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0003
rows.name:
Have you no pride at all?! Grraaaaagh!
...Damn this Skell! Move! MOVE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! You were the one who said I could do what
I wanted if I beat you! Do not proud Wrothians such as
you always keep their word?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0005
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
I have dreamed of this forever,
but you finally made it come true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_JNK0010
rows.name: Congratulate

rows.label: qev050404_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell De Ezich that you are happy for him.

rows.label: qev050404_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev050404_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why De Ezich had you fight as his proxy.

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0006
rows.name:
You are the first one to truly understand me.
A while back, I told my parents I wanted to leave the
Wrothian hideout and live on my own in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0007
rows.name:
Did I not mention it? Ah. Well, some while ago,
I told my parents I wanted to leave the Wrothian
hideout and go live on my own in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0008
rows.name:
Both of them were furious. They accused me of
abandoning my duty to Prince Jiarg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0009
rows.name:
We had a huge row over it, and in the end my father
said I could leave only if I defeated him in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0010
rows.name:
But then you came along and saved the day!
Thanks to your efforts, I am a free man. Now I shall—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0011
rows.name: De Ezich! Have you no shame?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0012
rows.name:
Your outrageous behavior, your insults to Sazon,
head of the House of De... I have seen it all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0013
rows.name: Urgh... Hello, Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0014
rows.name:
I have tolerated your shallow behavior unbecoming of a
Wrothian for love of the child I bore into this world...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0015
rows.name:
But that ends here. And since I am responsible for
giving you life, I must be the one to end it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0016
rows.name:
Egads! My mother becomes crazy when she is this
angered. She might be mad enough to kill me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0017
rows.name:
But, uh, you won't let that happen, right?
I know you can stop her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_JNK0030
rows.name: Help

rows.label: qev050404_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell De Ezich to stand back and leave it to you.

rows.label: qev050404_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev050404_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that you are not becoming
involved in a family squabble.

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh, whew! Thank you, my friend. And...good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0019
rows.name: Wh-what?! No! You cannot abandon me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0020
rows.name:
Look! She is already coming for me!
You have to stop her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0021
rows.name:
...What is your intent, human? Will you aid this fool?
Then I shall end you both where you stand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050404_MSG0022
rows.name:
Do not worry—I shall follow you in death as soon as I
am finished. Now accept your fate![ST:wait ]
